author: cbs8
title: The 900th Episode of MoneyTV with Donald Baillargeon, 10/16
text:
MoneyTV; CLS Holdings USA , Inc.; Green Chip Investor Relations; New Media Insight Group, Inc.; PeerLogix, Inc.; The Advocacy Network; Vapor Hub International, Inc.
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 16, MoneyTV's 900th show, cannabis extraction science, mobile payments, vaping, torrent revenue, rentrack; this week on MoneyTV with Donald Baillargeon . MoneyTV is the internationally syndicated television program all about money and what makes it happen, ( http://www.moneytv.net ), featuring informative interviews with company CEOs, providing insights into their operations and outlooks for their futures.
Free information packages from the featured companies can be requested by sending an email to info@moneytv.net .
The television program can also be viewed online immediately at www.moneytv.net .
Featured companies on this week's program include:
CLS Holdings USA , Inc. (OTCQB: CLSH) Chairman & CEO Jeffrey Binder discussed the various methods of cannabis extraction versus the company's scientific methods.
Green Chip Investor Relations President Matt Chipman spoke of factors affecting small and micro-cap markets.
New Media Insight Group, Inc. (OTCQB: NMED) CEO Michael Palethorpe updated information about their customer retention product.
PeerLogix, Inc. (OTCQB: LOGX) CEO William Gorfein analyzed a recent $700+ million acquisition of Rentrack, a company with a business model similar to LOGX.
The Advocacy Network Founder Karl Schilling talked about protecting people from financial scams.
Vapor Hub International, Inc. (OTCPINK: VHUB) CEO Kyle Winther spoke of a recent show attended in Texas and highlights of their 10K.
A complete menu of TV listings is available at the MoneyTV web site, http://www.moneytv.net .
MoneyTV Executive Producer and Anchor Donald Baillargeon is also the host of MoneyRap Radio, http://www.moneyrap.com and the daily television program Global Financial News Minute with Donald Baillargeon .
MoneyTV with Donald Baillargeon television program, Copyright MMXV, all rights reserved. MoneyTV does not provide an analysis of companies' financial positions and is not soliciting to purchase or sell securities of the companies, nor are we offering a recommendation of featured companies or their stocks. Information discussed herein has been provided by the companies and should be verified independently with the companies and a securities analyst. MoneyTV provides companies a 3 to 4 month corporate profile with multiple appearances for a cash fee of $11,995.00 to $17,250.00, does not accept company stock as payment for services, does not hold any positions, options or warrants in featured companies. The information herein is not an endorsement by Donald Baillargeon, the producer, publisher or parent company of MoneyTV.
